column4: when i try and access my windows network on karmic i cant access it but when i use a live cd of karmic i can.  how can i fix this?

it doesnt let me access the windows network. nothing happens it just wont connect
im not sure. But when you suggested to use the live cd it worked wonderfully
have you set up a static ip and stuff on your install?
i dont believe so i have trouble shot samba and smbfs alot so that might of changed it but i havent gone into network connections and changed that
try doing cat /etc/resolv.conf on both your install and the livecd, make sure they're the same
I had similar problems and it turned out to be dns issue
yes the cat /etc/resolv.conf is the same on the live disk as it is on my install
hmmm, then sorry I'm out of ideas
i think im going to re install karmic
I guess that would be the easy way :D
Hi i got it working by reinstalling 9.10 thanks for your help
